sentence.Network_en: We congratulated her upon her attainment to so great an age.
Could it be said that it is impossible of attainment?
sentence.Network_cn: 难道这是办不到的 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: We congratulated him upon his attainment to so great an age.

entry.def: The attainment of an aim is the achieving of it.
An attainment is a skill you have learned or something you have achieved.

means.word_mean: 1. the act of achieving an aim;

sentences.sentence: "his attainment of puberty was delayed by malnutrition"

means.word_mean: 3. an ability that has been acquired by training

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =hold,表示"拿住,握住,支撑"; 2. 挽留

stems_affixes.word_buile: attain[v.达到;获得]+able可以……的→adj.可到达的,可得到的
pertain[[v.属于,关于]]男→adj.恰当的;有关的
contain包含,容纳+er表名词→n.容器;集装箱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 款待, 娱乐, 娱乐表演
stems_affixes.word_buile: entertain娱乐,招待+ment表名词→n.款待, 娱乐, 娱乐表演

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保留,保持,保持力,记忆力
stems_affixes.word_buile: retain[[v.适合,保持,保留]]→n.保留,保持,保持力,记忆力
attain[v.达到;获得]+ment表名词→n.完成,成就

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包含,容纳;容忍,抑制;可被……除尽
stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+tain拿住,握住,支撑→全部拿住→包含,容纳
de加强动作+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿住,拿下→拘留

stems_affixes.value_cn: 娱乐, 招待, 接受, 怀抱
stems_affixes.word_buile: enter进入,走进+tain挽留→使……挽留→休息,娱乐

stems_affixes.value_cn: 维修,保养,维持,供养,坚持,主张,支持
stems_affixes.word_buile: main=man+tain拿住,握住,支撑→用手拿住→坚持
ob加强动作+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿到,获得
per始终+tain拿住,握住,支撑→始终拿着→属于,关于
re回来+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿回来→保留
sus下面+tain握住→在下面握住→支撑

sentences.en: The attainment of the success is not easy.
We congratulated her upon her attainment to so great an age.
We can’t exaggerate his scientific attainment.
sentences.cn: 我们无法估量他在科学上的造诣。

sentences.en: He is a scholar of the highest attainments.
sentences.cn: 他是位造诣很深的学者。
